children.name: Calendo - Privacy Policy
Calendo
Calendo
- Privacy Policy

Calendo allows you to connect calendars from multiple providers. We use your calendar data from your connected accounts to determine your schedule and prevent double bookings. Users who schedule meetings with you will never be able to see what your schedule looks like.
By using our website you acknowledge that you have read, understood and agreed to our privacy policy and
terms of service
terms of service
. If you do not agree to these terms, please exit this website and stop using the Calendo app.
1. The contents of this policy are subject to change without notice. You are encouraged to visit this page often and keep yourself updated with the latest policy changes.
The contents of this policy are subject to change without notice. You are encouraged to visit this page often and keep yourself updated with the latest policy changes.
2. Calendo app follows the guidelines written down in: Google API Services User Data Policy.
Calendo app follows the guidelines written down in:
Google API Services User Data Policy
Google API Services User Data Policy
3. We collect personally identifiable information such as Name, Email and for the proper functioning of our product and making the booking process smooth.
We collect personally identifiable information such as Name, Email and for the proper functioning of our product and making the booking process smooth.
4. We may from time to time collect non personally identifiable information to analyze the usage of our product to make it better. This information may be disclosed to our Partners and Advertisers.
We may from time to time collect non personally identifiable information to analyze the usage of our product to make it better. This information may be disclosed to our Partners and Advertisers.
5. We make best efforts to secure your data. Communication between your browser and our servers is encrypted using SSL.
We make best efforts to secure your data. Communication between your browser and our servers is encrypted using SSL.
6. If you have any questions, please direct them to: hello@n10kquests.com
